item.title: Promiscuous
item.description: adjective having or characterized by many transient sexual relationships. Test.

item.title: The Two Faced Pantheon
item.description: God Known as the Kephela Dutdadi Kochavlala - The Stars and Space Mohthaima - Life and Death Rashrika - Noise and Silence Cherelevana - Sun and Moon Nahardama - Bodies of freshwater and Land Okyanusyama - Sea and Sky Eshkhomkara - Fire and Ice Orkoshecka - Light and Darkness Marpecholi - Plague and ...

item.title: Kokava
item.description: NPC Interested in Mithral at the scholar house in Tokarov.

item.title: Taava Min
item.description: NPC Woman who works with Hema Evra who wanted to murder a child. Somehow, Thaddeus still crushes on her (Disgusting).

item.title: Talyanna Bula
item.description: NPC Tokarov Incompetent lawyer, grey hair and glasses, around teenage. His only case of note that he won was domestic abuse. I’m not incompetent!.

item.title: Dracuff
item.description: NPC A servant of Shapiffany ‘Piff’ Oros.

item.title: Reginald
item.description: NPC A servant of Shapiffany ‘Piff’ Oros.

item.title: Yzex'kyllis
item.description: PC A lizardfolk sorcerer working under Lady Piff to help restore the Oros family’s status.

item.title: Session 1
item.description: Session In the neutral king’s land in the city of Tokarov, the party arrives.
